subject: asm-generic: Consolidate mark_rodata_ro()
body:
Instead of defining mark_rodata_ro() in each architecture, consolidate it.

Signed-off-by: Kees Cook <keescook@chromium.org>

full_message:
asm-generic: Consolidate mark_rodata_ro()

Instead of defining mark_rodata_ro() in each architecture, consolidate it.

Signed-off-by: Kees Cook <keescook@chromium.org>
